hero-paragraph: I'm a <bold>Software Engineer</bold> who gets the job done. Currently, I'm focused on <skill>Full-stack</skill> Web and Mobile Development.

about-me.title: About me
about-me.intro-paragraph-1: Hello, World! My name is <bold>Vlad</bold> and I am a Full-Stack <bold>Software Engineer</bold> based in Poland, who enjoys creating new things for the web and mobile and has a passion for problem solving. With the successful completion of my Bachelorâ€™s Degree at the Technical University of KoÅ¡ice, my educational background equips me with a profound understanding of fundamental computer science principles.
about-me.intro-paragraph-2: During my tenure as a frontend developer, I had the invaluable opportunity to refine my expertise in crafting visually captivating and user-centric interfaces. This chapter not only facilitated seamless collaboration with diverse, cross-functional teams but also granted me a profound insight into the intricate artistry of user experience.
about-me.intro-paragraph-3: Feel free to reach out via the provided contact information. Thank you for visiting, and I look forward to the opportunity of working together to bring your technological visions to life.

projects.title: My Latest Projects
projects.summary: A collection of personal projects Iâ€™ve built or am currently working on.
projects.toki: A web application designed to help users track issues efficiently. It allows users to log issues, update their status, and store the necessary details.
projects.pokedex: A PokÃ©dex web application built with Vue.js that allows users to browse, search, and view detailed information about various PokÃ©mon, including their stats and abilities.
projects.graphs: Single page React application that allows users to create graph structures, export the canvas as a png image and check the correctness of coloring.

summary.education: I started my career learning Software Engineering concepts while studying at the Technical University of Kosice.
summary.promiseo: My first job was a part-time frontend role at Promiseo, a marketing agency in KoÅ¡ice. I was responsible for developing new pages for different clients.
summary.boataround: After that, I joined Boataround, a yacht rental company in Bratislava. There, I worked on adding new features, improving existing ones, and helped build a brand new web app for yacht owners using React and TypeScript.

boataround.description: Created and optimized components and dynamic pages for a yacht rental web platform using Vue.js, React, and Node.js, and optimized MongoDB queries, reducing page load time. Cooperated with various departments to implement solutions for a wide range of features. Conducted code reviews and resolved critical UI/UX bugs, improving user experience. Implemented several A/B tests to evaluate and refine website features, improving conversion rates and increasing user engagement.

freelance.description: Revamped the frontend UI of a time conversion website by migrating from Bootstrap to Bulma CSS, improving code maintainability and reducing CSS bloat. Delivered full-stack solutions for clients using React, Vue.js, TypeScript, and Pythonâ€™s Flask framework, tailoring implementations to meet unique business requirements.

promiseo.description: Built visually appealing web interfaces using HTML, CSS/Sass, JavaScript, and Vue.js. Collaborated closely with design and product teams to transform wireframes and mockups into fully functional web pages for various small and medium-sized local businesses.
